c74object.name: jeynoise~
c74object.digest: A sine and cosine wave oscillator that works based on Period-by-Period Synthesis technique
c74object.description: Frequency, period-duration, and phase offset set the state of the object. The frequencies are determined by external signals or internally-generated-and-redistributed PseudoRandom Numbers (PRNs). Also, the redistribution of the PRNs (for setting frequencies) is performed according to a list-style Probability Distribution Function (PDF). The discrete probabilities of the PDF-list can be interpolated.

inlet.digest: (SIGNAL Hz.) frequencies (LIST of numbers) PDF of frequencies (MESSAGEs) various arguments

outlet.digest: (SIGNAL Hz.) frequency is outputted when the new sine-wave-period(s) begins, 0 otherwise

objarg.name: not-setting-to-'exp'-mode
objarg.digest: Lets object to perform band-limited Period-by-Period Synthesis
objarg.description:
When the first argument is a number or there's no argument, the object doesn't run in the 'exp' mode. In this case, the argument(s) set/sets the following.
— 1st: 'period duration' factor [float./int.]
— 2nd: 'phase offset' factor [float./int.]

objarg.name: setting-to-'exp'-mode'
objarg.digest: Lets object to perform in 'exp' mode
objarg.description:
If the command 'exp' is the first argument, then the object runs in the 'exp' mode. The object in this mode does not support receiving any other arguments written within it.
— 1st (required): 'exp' (mode specifier)
